overview: Queer theory dynamites the foundations of dualism that dominates our society: man-woman, gay-straight, normal-strange... There are as many shades between man and woman as between black and white. As an example of gender diversity, we follow five characters as they go about their daily life. A day-to-day that does not fit the pattern of a “normal” male or a regular woman. The normality of those who aren't “normal.”
title: Test de la vida real
